title: CocoaAction extension
description: Extension for the First-Mile Farm Data Schema to comply to the CocoaAction data submission template

metaData.title: metaData-adds
metaData.description: data attributes added to the meta data entity

Reporting year.title: Reporting year
Reporting year.description: Year of reporting to Cocoa Action

Group.title: Group-adds
Group.description: data attributes added to the group data entity

Averageproduction.title: Average production by group
Averageproduction.description: Average production by the farmer group calculated as the production sum off all farmers devided by the total cultivated area

Averagemaleproduction.title: Average producution by males
Averagemaleproduction.description: Average producution by the males in the group calculated as the production sum off all male farmers devided by the total area cultivated by the male farmers

Averagefemaleproduction.title: Average producution by females
Averagefemaleproduction.description: Average producution by the females in the group calculated as the production sum off all female farmers devided by the total area cultivated by the female farmers

Farmer.title: Farmer-adds
Farmer.description: data attributes to the farmer data entity

#Farmsmanaged.title: # Farms managed
#Farmsmanaged.description: Number of farms managed by this particular farmer (ownership of the farm is an attriute of the farm itself, since farms can also be owned by an other private individual, a compagny or a community )

participatedintraining.title: Participated in training
participatedintraining.description: The farmer participated in the cocoa-action training (yes=1,no=0)

Farm.title: Farm-adds
Farm.description: data attributes to the farm data entity

Estimatedproduction.title: Estimated farm production
Estimatedproduction.description: Estimated production of the whole farm

Plot.title: plot-adds
Plot.description: data attributes added to the plot data entity

agemajorityTrees.title: Age majority trees
agemajorityTrees.description: Age of the majority of the trees

frequencyofPodcollection.title: Age majority trees
frequencyofPodcollection.description: Age of the majority of the trees

beginningofPodcollection.title: Beginning of the pod collection
beginningofPodcollection.description: Month indicating the beginning of the pod collection period

plotObservation.title: Plotobservation-adds
plotObservation.description: data attributes to the plot observation data entity

GAP1.title: Cocoapruning
GAP1.description: Basic GAP1: Cocoa tree pruning observation score

GAP2.title: Pest and diseases scores
GAP2.description: Basic GAP2: Pest and diseases observed at this location

GAP3.title: CocoaWeed
GAP3.description: Basic GAP3: Cocoa tree weed management score

GAP4.title: Shadescores
GAP4.description: Basic GAP4: Cocoa tree shade management score

needforShade.title: Need for shade
needforShade.description: The need for permanent or temporary shade at the point of observation

plannedShadingactions.title: Planned shading actions
plannedShadingactions.description: Actiones planned to improve the shading conditions
